system.requirements: Tyrantine Shadow Agent Alternative Advance, 100xp, Int 30.
system.effect: Gain +10 to Deceive tests whilst being questioned, to resist someone using the Initimidate Skill, and to Willpower when resisting Interrogation or mind reading effects (if a psychic power, combines with outer resistance talents).

description.value: Gain +10 to Deceive tests whilst being questioned, to resist someone using the Initimidate Skill, and to Willpower when resisting Interrogation or mind reading effects (if a psychic power, combines with outer resistance talents).
